医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现酮饮食如何帮助一些多发性硬化症患者科学家们长期以来一直怀疑生酮饮食可能能够平息过度活跃的免疫系统，并帮助一些患有多发性硬化症等疾病的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-discover-how-the-keto-diet-may-help-some-people-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-discover-how-the-keto-diet-may-help-some-people-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=274af40f-a5b6-4c62-9a8e-62db68357a25 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 13:04:13 -0500 Scientists discover how the keto diet may help some people with multiple sclerosis
薄荷醇卷烟的限制可能会带来更健康的选择在全国范围内，吸烟的人比十年前少了，但吸薄荷味卷烟的比例却在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Menthol-香烟-restrictions-could-lead-to-healthier-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Menthol-香烟-restrictions-could-lead-to-healthier-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5e4379c-1598-4e95-ab12-e5d46ef71d55 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:31:54 -0500 Menthol cigarette restrictions could lead to healthier choices
先进的深度学习技术增强脉络膜血管可视化北京大学的研究人员开发了一种新型无创脉络膜血管造影方法，可以利用深度学习对脉络膜血管进行分层可视化和评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Advanced-deep-learning-technique-enhances-choroidal-vessel-visualization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Advanced-deep-learning-technique-enhances-choroidal-vessel-visualization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2731631-d17e-45f0-a471-0a10e9207624 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:20:52 -0500 Advanced deep learning technique enhances choroidal vessel visualization
100 万美元拨款支持多发性硬化症突破性疗法的研究多发性硬化症 (MS) 是一种使大脑和脊髓衰弱的疾病，影响着全世界数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/241-million-grant-supports-research-on-groundwriting-therapies-for-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/241-million-grant-supports-research-on-groundwriting-therapies-for-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87b92744-fcbc-4754-9056-f016d4f6c688 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:08:42 -0500 $1 million grant supports research on groundbreaking therapies for MS
研究探讨分娩姿势对产妇满意度的影响无论是仰卧、四肢着地、直立还是蹲着——女性在分娩时会采取不同的分娩姿势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-examines-impact-of-birthing-positions-on-maternal-satisfaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-examines-impact-of-birthing-positions-on-maternal-satisfaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4039c597-47f4-46c8-bfe4-cf53d3411797 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 11:58:00 -0500 Study examines impact of birthing positions on maternal satisfaction
远程口译引起人们对医疗保健领域沟通质量的担忧由于医疗保健行业在 COVID-19 大流行期间严重依赖技术，口译员报告了不同的经历，这引发了人们对远程通信平台在关键医疗环境中的有效性的严重质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2159150c-2c6b-4a4d-ac52-746c118ade54 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 11:13:20 -0500 Remote interpreting raises concerns about communication quality in healthcare
研究人员开发出第一种基于聚合物的亨廷顿病疗法基于聚合物的突破性疗法有望通过预防有毒蛋白质团块和增强神经元存活来逆转亨廷顿病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Researchers-develop-the-first-polymer-based-therapeutic-for-Huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Researchers-develop-the-first-polymer-based-therapeutic-for-Huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=773f330f-a82a-435a-b9ab-6e4e73005911 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 09:25:00 -0500 Researchers develop the first polymer-based therapeutic for Huntington’s disease
年轻时诊断出 2 型糖尿病的人死亡风险更高研究结果表明，年轻发病的 2 型糖尿病与较高的死亡率和并发症相关，这凸显了采取有针对性的医疗保健策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Mortality-risk-higher-for-those-diagnosed-with-type-2-diabetes-at-younger-ages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Mortality-risk-higher-for-those-diagnosed-with-type-2-diabetes-at-younger-ages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdece1b7-e94d-4e15-b6ed-5519c81fb2df Mon, 04 Nov 2024 08:49:00 -0500 Mortality risk higher for those diagnosed with type 2 diabetes at younger ages
太空生长的干细胞有望加速生物疗法梅奥诊所的两名研究人员表示，在国际空间站（ISS）微重力下生长的干细胞具有独特的品质，有朝一日可以帮助加速新的生物疗法并治愈复杂的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Space-grown-stem-cells-show-promise-for-acceleating-biotherapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Space-grown-stem-cells-show-promise-for-acceleating-biotherapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0302c047-fe3d-4de6-b362-fb70b431ab4b Mon, 04 Nov 2024 08:15:06 -0500 Space-grown stem cells show promise for accelerating biotherapies
获得拨款建造便携式 PET 扫描仪用于早期阿尔茨海默病检测威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家老龄化研究所获得了为期五年的 620 万美元拨款，用于建造便携式高分辨率正电子发射断层扫描 (PET) 扫描仪，该扫描仪可以检测老年痴呆症的早期阶段。阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Grant-awarded-to-build-a-portable-PET-scanner-for-early-Alzheimers-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Grant-awarded-to-build-a-portable-PET-scanner-for-early-Alzheimers-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7815bb3-dd5d-46a2-a02e-ca9fc4e0e6a9 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:59:25 -0500 Grant awarded to build a portable PET scanner for early Alzheimer's detection
